document.title: Working Together for Public Service: Final Report

author.organization: U.S. Secretary of Labor's Task Force on Excellence in State and Local Government Through Labor-Management Cooperation

document.abstract: The findings in this report are the unanimous conclusions of a 14 member Task Force on Excellence in State and Local Government through Labor-Management Cooperation, whose members were drawn from the ranks of labor, management, elected officials, neutrals and academics.

field.name: comments
field.value:
